<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a function somewhere that will call to it that for some reason disabled</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the module otherwise. Therefore set AlwaysUseISBSDB to true.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;ARMSLSHardening::ConvertIndirectCallToIndirectJump(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Transform an indirect call to an indirect jump as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |-----------------------------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |      ...                    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |  instI                      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |  BLX rN                     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |  instJ                      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |      ...                    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |-----------------------------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |----------   -------------------------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |      ...                             |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |  instI                               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |  &#42;call&#42; &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;slsblr&#95;thunk&#95;mode&#95;xN  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |  instJ                               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |      ...                             |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |--------------------------------------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;slsblr&#95;thunk&#95;mode&#95;xN:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |  BX rN                      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |  barrierInsts               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |-----------------------------|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The &#95;&#95;llvm&#95;slsblr&#95;thunk&#95;mode&#95;xN thunks are created by the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now copy the implicit operands from IndirectCall to BL and copy other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// necessary info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, both IndirectCall and BL instructions implictly use SP and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implicitly define LR. Blindly copying implicit operands would result in SP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and LR operands to be present multiple times. While this may not be too</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// much of an issue, let&#39;s avoid that for cleanliness, by removing those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implicit operands from the BL created above before we copy over all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implicit operands from the IndirectCall.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ImpLROpIdx = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ImpSPOpIdx = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpIdx = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arcisd/#a383dfc381bd557f340886bb106e3d92ea37102c3bc1feaf214eb32e66a1ffc007">BL</a>-&gt;getNumExplicitOperands();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">       OpIdx &lt; BL-&gt;getNumOperands(); OpIdx++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
